file_content.text: A welcoming committee. Some days you just can't land secretly on a planet. Even on a secret landing strip.
I am Darth Baras's apprentice. He has rescinded your orders.
[Lie] You've been recalled.
Ah. No, you aren't, and no, he hasn't.
If you know what's good for you, you will get back in your ship and forget about your assignment.
Leave.
If you knew who sent me, you'd know that would not be good for me.
This is going to be your secret graveyard.
Nice place to die.
You're funny. I like that. Not a lot of funny in my line of work.
I know who you are. You're the apprentice Darth Baras thought he had killed. Marvelous.
I've studied you, followed your exploits across the galaxy. You're a personal hero of mine.
If you know me, you know what I'll do to you if we fight.
Then back down.
You don't have to tell me. I've kept track of your kills.
Didn't know I had admirers.
Is that so?
In my profession, you're well-known. But I'm somewhat obsessed, I admit.
Trying to distract me won't work.
Is this a tactic?
I'm completely serious. You're a bit of an obsession.
The way you handled Lord Grathan on Dromund Kaas was genius. Yes, I know his son's behind the mask now.
I heard of you when you killed Lord Grathan's son on Dromund Kaas. Three different Sith hired me to do that.
You took out Nomen Karr and Admiral Monk and the War Trust and countless Jedi. Good good stuff.
Stop buttering me up. Leave or die.
Enough.
Sorry to wax on. I just wanted you to know how I feel before I kill you.
It's nice to be appreciated.
Thank you.
It's an honor to meet you. So sad I have to kill you.
I've imagined facing you. And given my knowledge, I have pretty good ideas on taking you down.
Well, here, let me show you.
Time to add you to the list.
No more talk. [Attack]
